mdBlocks.parent: ここでは活動で使用するツールである**Gitのインストール**と**Githubのアカウント登録**をする方法を説明します。
## Gitのインストール
### 1. インストーラーのダウンロード
Git公式サイト（[https://gitforwindows.org/?_fsi=LfoGMNmY](https://gitforwindows.org/?_fsi=LfoGMNmY)）にアクセスしてください。 Downloadボタンをクリックしてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.19.19.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/ef24dd58-7dc7-45b9-b5bd-e50f9cd2fa59/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.19.19.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YZ73FLFL%2F20250316%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250316T092853Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEND%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLxk4Es0fTlb6V2vJCUnkgqBNDhNVfkizi6x1n%2F%2FX22AIhALUVavqTA4PXO%2FudfD67QhtfXU8jsLh5X0kB1GJ%2BTnyUKv8DCCkQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igzv3mK%2FQJF4jIhzxUEq3ANXq15DbikiNpH2xSPMufM3T%2Fq9zyKqHKYjcgif%2BxT5y90Fl7uBFvrGUluDYLcNWTBffByCbBBWxZvq0d5P4eEOxShf%2FUKBn4%2BtRrjV1x3FvjU%2F%2BWtg6Z3FU2GasB5IpSdwym%2B6YZvLIFpb9v3OE33ouhhd4A0%2B4VHeXYdu1W2%2BwpOg6FsThgRI1uF89UOU2xm39cl7gdy2C214VmIk2Hw279pbsCVe1%2BqKljvvSBq7YIBXhRwX30%2FCgfIylehEbHeakV9djsuTmwsE%2Bzi2AgWKWC3Dt4QEDZjyBEyH7ivBOBK7%2F%2Bt1wS0alxmeLoJCaBwBygVxGMPriP%2FZFf2dKPqcfvjUVv1wkoQnvvlgVQumwCXDJMg5qSxTSuwML%2FtGFqZCEyB2FOP0DwBFj1g0Hxaf7xo7lVsTyZ9DbfXAl5t33LAKtWVJomlonxp6yg83ROgkVs%2FROz6lc5GmXRjL%2BhEOz%2FBr7T2vBtKxglQxBleHtUjkuAY4U6xabLPvTrpH2dssuGC%2BirsbPpAf%2BkSah749esBQCq0NYtHvIihYzQ%2Bqgjg8KYf%2BO1tBTEBodRpyP8q4rBeChicAgMZ5qaYLcYJxkj5IKluxeNzev0nd6cXIsi%2B45YFSqkvm1R6G5DD0kdq%2BBjqkAf5gakmHGaAUQiSLGiBI%2Bryw9OUYdd%2B5c9vlP3KcomSwQ01Ee9nFZ82B3yFRrSv%2BZ7BLgXtR410uXPjKULfgtFnaOC3OGwTteUncIA14uKyObbQ%2FTJzoW2HStqD5udlA5rwoqZwuobr0W0a4JFzUJSSY6uVbeT1K9BLjzGQ5S%2FfiR7%2F0u1oVCxCMcanfd1gQMUEKSIVI%2BHl0jSpLUa9LyN5Acl9e&X-Amz-Signature=079dd076fca277cd395bb5e63d8ea5f1c7a908c17798c0028b9c4a9bbbfce427&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
Gitのインストーラーがダウンロードされます。（※数分かかります）

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.24.48.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/79573433-f039-4aca-9f94-d45271b62a25/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.24.48.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YZ73FLFL%2F20250316%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250316T092853Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEND%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLxk4Es0fTlb6V2vJCUnkgqBNDhNVfkizi6x1n%2F%2FX22AIhALUVavqTA4PXO%2FudfD67QhtfXU8jsLh5X0kB1GJ%2BTnyUKv8DCCkQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igzv3mK%2FQJF4jIhzxUEq3ANXq15DbikiNpH2xSPMufM3T%2Fq9zyKqHKYjcgif%2BxT5y90Fl7uBFvrGUluDYLcNWTBffByCbBBWxZvq0d5P4eEOxShf%2FUKBn4%2BtRrjV1x3FvjU%2F%2BWtg6Z3FU2GasB5IpSdwym%2B6YZvLIFpb9v3OE33ouhhd4A0%2B4VHeXYdu1W2%2BwpOg6FsThgRI1uF89UOU2xm39cl7gdy2C214VmIk2Hw279pbsCVe1%2BqKljvvSBq7YIBXhRwX30%2FCgfIylehEbHeakV9djsuTmwsE%2Bzi2AgWKWC3Dt4QEDZjyBEyH7ivBOBK7%2F%2Bt1wS0alxmeLoJCaBwBygVxGMPriP%2FZFf2dKPqcfvjUVv1wkoQnvvlgVQumwCXDJMg5qSxTSuwML%2FtGFqZCEyB2FOP0DwBFj1g0Hxaf7xo7lVsTyZ9DbfXAl5t33LAKtWVJomlonxp6yg83ROgkVs%2FROz6lc5GmXRjL%2BhEOz%2FBr7T2vBtKxglQxBleHtUjkuAY4U6xabLPvTrpH2dssuGC%2BirsbPpAf%2BkSah749esBQCq0NYtHvIihYzQ%2Bqgjg8KYf%2BO1tBTEBodRpyP8q4rBeChicAgMZ5qaYLcYJxkj5IKluxeNzev0nd6cXIsi%2B45YFSqkvm1R6G5DD0kdq%2BBjqkAf5gakmHGaAUQiSLGiBI%2Bryw9OUYdd%2B5c9vlP3KcomSwQ01Ee9nFZ82B3yFRrSv%2BZ7BLgXtR410uXPjKULfgtFnaOC3OGwTteUncIA14uKyObbQ%2FTJzoW2HStqD5udlA5rwoqZwuobr0W0a4JFzUJSSY6uVbeT1K9BLjzGQ5S%2FfiR7%2F0u1oVCxCMcanfd1gQMUEKSIVI%2BHl0jSpLUa9LyN5Acl9e&X-Amz-Signature=de2326ddc204831bded64a41032558c93b15260de9863e21df04911f836b7a4b&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
### ２. インストール
ダウンロードしたインストーラーをダブルクリックして起動しましょう。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.26.37.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/adee1e38-a96e-487d-9d4c-9279202d7dc0/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.26.37.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YZ73FLFL%2F20250316%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250316T092853Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEND%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLxk4Es0fTlb6V2vJCUnkgqBNDhNVfkizi6x1n%2F%2FX22AIhALUVavqTA4PXO%2FudfD67QhtfXU8jsLh5X0kB1GJ%2BTnyUKv8DCCkQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igzv3mK%2FQJF4jIhzxUEq3ANXq15DbikiNpH2xSPMufM3T%2Fq9zyKqHKYjcgif%2BxT5y90Fl7uBFvrGUluDYLcNWTBffByCbBBWxZvq0d5P4eEOxShf%2FUKBn4%2BtRrjV1x3FvjU%2F%2BWtg6Z3FU2GasB5IpSdwym%2B6YZvLIFpb9v3OE33ouhhd4A0%2B4VHeXYdu1W2%2BwpOg6FsThgRI1uF89UOU2xm39cl7gdy2C214VmIk2Hw279pbsCVe1%2BqKljvvSBq7YIBXhRwX30%2FCgfIylehEbHeakV9djsuTmwsE%2Bzi2AgWKWC3Dt4QEDZjyBEyH7ivBOBK7%2F%2Bt1wS0alxmeLoJCaBwBygVxGMPriP%2FZFf2dKPqcfvjUVv1wkoQnvvlgVQumwCXDJMg5qSxTSuwML%2FtGFqZCEyB2FOP0DwBFj1g0Hxaf7xo7lVsTyZ9DbfXAl5t33LAKtWVJomlonxp6yg83ROgkVs%2FROz6lc5GmXRjL%2BhEOz%2FBr7T2vBtKxglQxBleHtUjkuAY4U6xabLPvTrpH2dssuGC%2BirsbPpAf%2BkSah749esBQCq0NYtHvIihYzQ%2Bqgjg8KYf%2BO1tBTEBodRpyP8q4rBeChicAgMZ5qaYLcYJxkj5IKluxeNzev0nd6cXIsi%2B45YFSqkvm1R6G5DD0kdq%2BBjqkAf5gakmHGaAUQiSLGiBI%2Bryw9OUYdd%2B5c9vlP3KcomSwQ01Ee9nFZ82B3yFRrSv%2BZ7BLgXtR410uXPjKULfgtFnaOC3OGwTteUncIA14uKyObbQ%2FTJzoW2HStqD5udlA5rwoqZwuobr0W0a4JFzUJSSY6uVbeT1K9BLjzGQ5S%2FfiR7%2F0u1oVCxCMcanfd1gQMUEKSIVI%2BHl0jSpLUa9LyN5Acl9e&X-Amz-Signature=31ab2bdae12176788b7821a9d7f17392d22f8722c535fa181d0cd734d4974bba&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)
あとは「Next」ボタンを押し続けてインストーラーをすすめ、最後の画面で「Install」ボタンをクリックして下さい。（設定値を変更する必要はありません。）
## GitHubアカウント登録
GitHub公式サイト（[https://github.com/](https://github.com/)）にアクセスしてください。
「Sign up for GitHub」をクリックしてください。

![%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.31.39.png](https://prod-files-secure.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/4faae8b3-4c31-46a7-898b-465eb6114fd9/23992aab-7e58-481d-b855-79492cbb9db8/%E3%82%B9%E3%82%AF%E3%83%AA%E3%83%BC%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B7%E3%83%A7%E3%83%83%E3%83%88_2024-11-05_14.31.39.png?X-Amz-Algorithm=AWS4-HMAC-SHA256&X-Amz-Content-Sha256=UNSIGNED-PAYLOAD&X-Amz-Credential=ASIAZI2LB466YZ73FLFL%2F20250316%2Fus-west-2%2Fs3%2Faws4_request&X-Amz-Date=20250316T092853Z&X-Amz-Expires=3600&X-Amz-Security-Token=IQoJb3JpZ2luX2VjEND%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2F%2FwEaCXVzLXdlc3QtMiJIMEYCIQCLxk4Es0fTlb6V2vJCUnkgqBNDhNVfkizi6x1n%2F%2FX22AIhALUVavqTA4PXO%2FudfD67QhtfXU8jsLh5X0kB1GJ%2BTnyUKv8DCCkQABoMNjM3NDIzMTgzODA1Igzv3mK%2FQJF4jIhzxUEq3ANXq15DbikiNpH2xSPMufM3T%2Fq9zyKqHKYjcgif%2BxT5y90Fl7uBFvrGUluDYLcNWTBffByCbBBWxZvq0d5P4eEOxShf%2FUKBn4%2BtRrjV1x3FvjU%2F%2BWtg6Z3FU2GasB5IpSdwym%2B6YZvLIFpb9v3OE33ouhhd4A0%2B4VHeXYdu1W2%2BwpOg6FsThgRI1uF89UOU2xm39cl7gdy2C214VmIk2Hw279pbsCVe1%2BqKljvvSBq7YIBXhRwX30%2FCgfIylehEbHeakV9djsuTmwsE%2Bzi2AgWKWC3Dt4QEDZjyBEyH7ivBOBK7%2F%2Bt1wS0alxmeLoJCaBwBygVxGMPriP%2FZFf2dKPqcfvjUVv1wkoQnvvlgVQumwCXDJMg5qSxTSuwML%2FtGFqZCEyB2FOP0DwBFj1g0Hxaf7xo7lVsTyZ9DbfXAl5t33LAKtWVJomlonxp6yg83ROgkVs%2FROz6lc5GmXRjL%2BhEOz%2FBr7T2vBtKxglQxBleHtUjkuAY4U6xabLPvTrpH2dssuGC%2BirsbPpAf%2BkSah749esBQCq0NYtHvIihYzQ%2Bqgjg8KYf%2BO1tBTEBodRpyP8q4rBeChicAgMZ5qaYLcYJxkj5IKluxeNzev0nd6cXIsi%2B45YFSqkvm1R6G5DD0kdq%2BBjqkAf5gakmHGaAUQiSLGiBI%2Bryw9OUYdd%2B5c9vlP3KcomSwQ01Ee9nFZ82B3yFRrSv%2BZ7BLgXtR410uXPjKULfgtFnaOC3OGwTteUncIA14uKyObbQ%2FTJzoW2HStqD5udlA5rwoqZwuobr0W0a4JFzUJSSY6uVbeT1K9BLjzGQ5S%2FfiR7%2F0u1oVCxCMcanfd1gQMUEKSIVI%2BHl0jSpLUa9LyN5Acl9e&X-Amz-Signature=ca6a69dee8ac7089080f41375c3bfa86b31339c54002a5824dd131b6e9c2d4ab&X-Amz-SignedHeaders=host&x-id=GetObject)

Sign up画面でメールアドレスとパスワードとユーザーネームを登録してください。
Email preferences項目のチェックボックスはチェックする必要はないです（不定期に製品の更新情報やお知らせを受け取るかどうかという項目）。
画面遷移したら「検証する」をクリックしてください。ロボットによる登録でないことを証明するため、画面の指示に従って進めてください。
